plot: Porky Pig and Daffy Duck owe an outrageous sum to the Broken Arms Hotel. The manager thwarts their efforts to escape without paying their bill.
title: Porky Pig's Feat
plot_es: Porky Pig and Daffy Duck owe an outrageous sum to the Broken Arms Hotel. The manager thwarts their efforts to escape without paying their bill.
plot_en: Porky Pig and Daffy Duck owe an outrageous sum to the Broken Arms Hotel. The manager thwarts their efforts to escape without paying their bill.

cast.role: Porky Pig /              Daffy Duck /              Broken Arms Hotel Manager /              Elevator Gambler /              Bugs Bunny
cast.name: Mel Blanc
